Articles.Content:
Just bought KSP 15 minutes ago, and I dominate all of Recommended stats on the Steam page (with the exception of being on El Capitan instead of Yosemite) on my upgraded Mac Mini late 2012.  Upon launching the game on my first install, I'm faced with a black screen and a "relaxed" KSP icon on the dock (It's not doing the bouncy thing when it's loading).  At first, my mouse cursor is fine but after about a second it turns to the pinwheel and the game never loads.  The KSP tab cannot be dragged around, minimized, or excited out of; it can only be closed via Activity Monitor, or Force Quit, both of which say KSP.application is not responding after about 30 seconds of being a pinwheel.  I have screenshots but the forum will not allow me to post them because I need to be approved by a moderator.

Edited April 20, 2016 by Purplemen101

For some reason, launching the Launcher.app from the Kerbal Space Program Steam folder causes the game to load after a brief black screen.  However, the in-game resolution is bugged and because of that I can't get to the resolution part of the options to change it.

 

Edit: For whatever reason, I can now launch it through Steam just fine.  My resolution is was still bugged, but I was able to go into settings.cfg in the Kerbal Space Program Steam folder and change it from 640x320 to 1920x1080

Edited April 21, 2016 by Purplemen101
Problem resolved somehow
